name: STAR WARSâ„¢: Rogue Squadron 3D

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Rogue Squadron 3D/ROGUE/ROGUE.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dsound
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Enable Windows 98 compatibility mode
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: GAMEDIR
    value: win98
